statements: SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_metrics LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT experience_id, impressions, conversions FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks, AVG(conversions) AS avg_conversions FROM ar_marketing_metrics;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT experience_id, impressions, engagement_rate FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE conversions >= 50 ORDER BY engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT experience_id, clicks, conversions, engagement_rate FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE impressions < 500 AND clicks >= 50 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT experience_id, clicks, impressions, conversions, engagement_rate FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY impressions ASC, clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000 AND conversions > 20 ORDER BY conversions DESC, engagement_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences;
SELECT id, experience_name, performance_metric FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE engagement_metric > 50;
SELECT experience_name, engagement_metric FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE performance_metric < 0.5;
SELECT id, total_engagement, completion_rate FROM AR_Marketing_Results WHERE total_engagement > 1000;
SELECT * FROM AR_Marketing_Results WHERE completion_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT id, experience_name, engagement_metric FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE engagement_metric > 50;
SELECT * FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT experience_name, total_engagement, completion_rate FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences JOIN AR_Marketing_Results ON AR_Marketing_Experiences.id = AR_Marketing_Results.experience_id;
SELECT id, experience_name, engagement_metric, performance_metric FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences WHERE performance_metric BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT AVG(engagement_metric) AS avg_engagement FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_experiences;
SELECT experience_name, target_audience FROM ar_marketing_experiences;
SELECT timestamp, clicks, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT experience_name, engagement_rate FROM ar_marketing_experiences WHERE engagement_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT experience_id, timestamp FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_marketing_experiences;
SELECT experience_name, engagement_rate FROM ar_marketing_experiences WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5;
SELECT em.metric_id, em.timestamp, pm.performance_id, pm.timestamp FROM engagement_metrics em INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON em.experience_id = pm.experience_id;
SELECT em.timestamp, SUM(em.clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(em.shares) AS total_shares FROM engagement_metrics em GROUP BY em.timestamp;
SELECT ae.experience_name, pm.conversion_rate, pm.revenue FROM ar_marketing_experiences ae INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON ae.experience_id = pm.experience_id WHERE pm.revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT engagement_rate, conversion_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE experience_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagements_score FROM user_metrics WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM experience_data WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experience_id, sessions, bounce_rate FROM device_metrics WHERE device_id = 1 AND sessions >= 100 ORDER BY bounce_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY session_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, visits FROM user_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY visits ASC;
SELECT experience_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM experience_data WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, sessions, bounce_rate FROM device_metrics WHERE sessions > 1000 ORDER BY bounce_rate DESC;

SELECT performance_metrics.experience_id, engagement_rate, conversion_rate, session_duration, campaign_name FROM performance_metrics JOIN experience_data ON performance_metrics.experience_id = experience_data.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences;
SELECT campaign_id, platform, engagement_metric FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences ORDER BY platform DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM Users WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_id, budget, targeting_criteria FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT campaign_id, budget, targeting_criteria FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT platform, engagement_metric, conversion_rate FROM AR_Marketing_Experiences ORDER BY engagement_metric DESC, conversion_rate ASC;
